review: The kids love it, it is so easy to use!
author: lara zellner

review: everything i was hoping for, bye bye cable!!!!
author: JAMES G VALLIANT

review: Easy to install and works great.  So nice to have access to my Pandora, Netflix, and Amazon Prime Movies on my big TV screen
author: jeannie Bell

review: I love the Fire TV Stick!!! I wish this product was available before I purchased my smart tv....It has practically all the bells & whistles of my smart tv at a fraction of the price. My only complaint is the power adapter. I wasn't expecting the stick to have to be connected to a power source but that's my bad!!! Nonetheless, I love it!!!
author: Ms Trini

review: I am very pleased with this product!!
author: wendy gavin

review: Such a great product! Exactly what I was looking for and at an amazing price! Netflix works very well! And connection was very simple!
author: Sarah

review: Super gadget competing wit h Apple TV. Has all Apple TV features & android apps too & can be used outside usa. Has airplay too. Super for it's price & a MUST HAVE!
author: Aycel
